Getting Started

Prerequisites

You can use this template by fork it from Github or to pull it from there. It’s built with Jekyll version 3.3.1, but should support newer versions as well.

You have to be in the root directory of Dokumentado to install the dependencies as follow:

$ bundle install

Run jekyll commands through Bundler to ensure you’re using the right versions:

$ bundle exec jekyll serve

To see the generated site, just visit http://localhost:4000.

→ Start the app
